title.narrative: Activity 3.2: Conduct community outreach and awareness raising activities on gender equality, nonviolent conflict prevention and response, and adoption of positive and nonviolent masculinities and techniques with all community members including specific activities targeted at key groups (men and boys, adolescents and children).
